thread.title: South Africa: Prasa's Official Statement On CEO Dismissal
thread.title_full: South Africa: Prasa's Official Statement On CEO Dismissal

title: South Africa: Prasa's Official Statement On CEO Dismissal
text:
Tanzania: Drivers Threaten Fresh Strike document 
Below is the official press statement by the Board of the Passenger Rail Agency of South Africa (Prasa), in which they announced the dismissal of CEO Lucky Montana. 
"On 15 July 2015 the board of the Passenger Rail Agency of South Africa (Prasa) resolved that Mr Montana will not be required to work the remainder of his notice period, which commenced on 1 June 2015. Mr Montana's last day of employment with the Prasa will accordingly be 15 July 2015. 
"The board is in the process of finding a suitable replacement. Until this process is finalised Mr Nathi Khena will be acting as the group chief executive Officer. Mr Khena is currently chief operations officer of Prasa and Acting CEO of Autopax. Related Topics
